titles.title: A resolution recognizing the accomplishments and significant contributions of Ray Charles to the world of music.
A resolution recognizing the accomplishments and significant contributions of Ray Charles to the world of music.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
Recognizes Ray Charles as one of the greatest American musicians of all time and honors him for his contributions to music, culture, community, and the United States.
Offers its appreciation to Ray Charles for sharing his musical gifts with the world.
Extends deepest sympathy to the family and loved ones of Ray Charles.
